Clinical Information.Medical use: ①Prevention of acute kidney injury after cardiac surgery; ②Treatment of sepsis.
Clinical Information.Company: Action Pharma A/S (Aarhus and Copenhagen, Denmark)

Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic derivative from HDP α-melanocyte-stimulating hormone
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found on DRAMP database
Reference: AP214, an analogue of alpha-melanocyte-stimulating hormone, ameliorates sepsis-induced acute kidney injury and mortality.(PMID:18354376)
